review: Best option to stay in Harsil (Mini Switzerland). It houses the apple orchard inside the hotel. Bonfire facility available on bank of the river flowing next to hotel premises. Excellent views and relaxing place. Food is OK. Nice place to halt during Gangotri Dham/Temple visit.
name: P K

review: Himalaya Resort is a beautiful place to stay in Harsil. You will find all modern amenities available here. At walking distance, there is a beautiful clear water stream where you can spend time by the river. Lama Tikri trek is also easily approachable from this resort. This is right opposite the Wilson House.
name: Namsh26
